title: Prince William Forest Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit      Prince William Forest Park is located only 35 miles south of Washington, DC and directly in between two other National Park Service units - Fredericksburg and Spotsylvania National Military Park and Manassas National Battlefield Park. With cabins and campgrounds, Prince William Forest Park is the ideal "home base" for your visit to the Washington, DC metropolitan region.  Watch our introductory video below for a quick overview of things to do at Prince William Forest Park.  Â                      Welcome to PRWI A brief welcome to all that Prince William Forest Park has to offer.  Duration:2 minutes, 18 seconds
